attributes.action: Stop the further expansion of Stansted Airport beyond 25 million passengers per annum
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Prevent the further expansion of Stansted Airport beyond the current maximum limit of 25 million passenger per annum by ensuring that both: 

a) Further expansion by greater use of the existing single runway to a level greater than 25mppa is not allowed.

b) The construction of a proposed second runway is not permitted.

government_responses.details:
You signed a petition asking the Prime Minister to "Stop the further expansion of Stansted Airport beyond 25 million passengers per annum."

The Prime Minister's Office has responded to that petition and you can view it here: 

http://www.pm.gov.uk/output/Page14142.asp

Prime Minister's Office
